results.title: Metformin combined with endoscopic therapy in patients with familial polyposis associated with carcinoma: A case report
results.text_hl: In recent years, many studies believe that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can inhibit the growth of @<m>DISEASE_Polyps</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011127 @@@polyps@@@ and @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumors@@@.

results.title: Is Metformin Associated with a Lower Prevalence of Polyps, Adenomas, and Colorectal Carcinoma in Patients with Diabetes Mellitus?
results.text_hl: The number of @<m>DISEASE_Polyps</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011127 @@@polyps@@@ detected was significantly lower in patients under @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (p = 0.014).

results.title: Possible protective role of metformin therapy on colonic polyps in acromegaly: an exploratory cross-sectional study.
results.text_hl: Of the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Polyps</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011127 @@@polyps@@@ (including three @DISEASE_Adenocarcinoma @DISEASE_MESH:D000230 @@@adenocarcinomas@@@) only 24% were treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ vs 57% of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ without @<m>DISEASE_Polyps</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011127 @@@polyps@@@.

results.title: Metformin for recurrent colorectal polyp or adenoma prevention after polypectomy in patients without diabetes mellitus: a prospective study.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ without @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ aged between 40 and 70 years old, with no @<m>DISEASE_Polyps</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011127 @@@polyp@@@ or @DISEASE_Adenoma @DISEASE_MESH:D000236 @@@adenoma@@@ after polypectomy, were randomly assigned to the control (no intervention), low-dose (500 mg/day), or high-dose (1,000 mg/day) @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ groups in a 1:1:1 ratio.

results.title: A Phase IIa Trial of Metformin for Colorectal Cancer Risk Reduction among Individuals with History of Colorectal Adenomas and Elevated Body Mass Index.
results.text_hl: The signaling pathway activated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@GENE_STK11 @GENE_20869 @@@LKB1@@@/AMPK/@GENE_MTOR @GENE_56717 @@@mTOR@@@) is implicated in @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ suppression in ApcMin/+ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ via @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Polyps</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011127 @@@polyp@@@ burden, increased ratio of pAMPK/AMPK, decreased pmTOR/@GENE_MTOR @GENE_56717 @@@mTOR@@@ ratio, and decreased pS6Ser235/S6Ser235 ratio in @<m>DISEASE_Polyps</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011127 @@@polyps@@@.

results.title: The Emerging Role of Metformin in the Prevention and Treatment of Colorectal Cancer: A Game Changer for the Management of Colorectal Cancer.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ decreases the risk of new @<m>DISEASE_Polyps</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011127 @@@polyps@@@ and @DISEASE_Adenoma @DISEASE_MESH:D000236 @@@adenomas@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ without @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

results.title: Metformin suppresses intestinal polyp growth in ApcMin/+ mice.
results.text_hl: These factors were not significantly attenuated by the treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, indicating that the suppression of @<m>DISEASE_Polyps</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011127 @@@polyp@@@ growth is not due to the indirect drug action.

results.title: Metformin for chemoprevention of metachronous colorectal adenoma or polyps in post-polypectomy patients without diabetes: a multicentre double-blind, placebo-controlled, randomised phase 3 trial.
results.text_hl: The median number of @<m>DISEASE_Polyps</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011127 @@@polyps@@@ was zero (IQR 0-1) in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group and one (0-1) in the placebo group (p=0 041).

results.title: Colon neoplasia in patients with type 2 diabetes on metformin: A meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: We performed a meta-analysis of available studies to better define the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@colon neoplasia@@@ (@DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Polyps</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011127 @@@polyps@@@) in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@.
